name: pish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
old use or humorous an expression of strong disapproval and dislike: "Pish!" was his reaction. pish posh
old-fashioned informalUK used to express disagreement or to say that something is nonsense: Oh, pish posh! Ridiculous.
See more
More examplesFewer examplesPah! Pish!With no one else will you hear expressions such as "crumbs", "bally" and "pish" being used.Pish. This is old news.
